item.title: This 'super flu' could cause widespread serious illness, experts say
item.description: Flu season has arrived, and with it a variant making headlines as a "super flu."

item.title: Study reveals low immunity against H3N2 strain in Hong Kong: Early vaccination urged
item.description: Flu activity has surged in many parts of the Northern Hemisphere, driven primarily by a newly emerged H3N2 strain known as subclade K.
